content: **crocheted butterfly pin in drops muskat ** see the just peachy hat pattern here 1 see the just peachy top pattern here 2 drops design pattern w-290b yarn group b + c ------------------------------------------------------------ butterfly brooch materials drops muskat from garnstudio a left-over of the following colours 49 dark orange and 39 heather drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm accessories small safety pin 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/82-34-just-peachy-hat 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/82-2-just-peachy
